pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classify Names by Gender, U.S. Ethnicity, and Leaf Nationality // Functions to use the 'NamePrism' API http://name-prism.com/api or 'NameSor' API https://api.namsor.com/namsor/faces/viewapikey.xhtml for classifying names based on gender, 6 U.S. ethnicities, or 39 leaf nationalities.
